backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining authorization mixin, radio network types, transmission records, user profile storage and access, plus signaling and activity state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON mapping of frontend file paths to short descriptions of their functionality and recent updates.
frontend/docs/promotions/version-23-prev: Promotion record template for Version 23 including checklists for verifying preview before production deployment.
frontend/docs/promotions/version-30-prev: Draft promotion record for Version 30 with attestation and detailed verification checklists.
frontend/docs/publish-preview-to-product: Runbook describing the process and required verification steps for promoting preview builds to production without code changes.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes, applying global background, text, and border styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, PWA manifest, iOS support, and loading the main frontend script.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest describing app metadata, colors, icons, and display settings.
frontend/public/offline.html: Standalone offline fallback page with basic styling and a retry button.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker handling caching, updating, and offline fallbacks with a network‑first strategy.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up app routing, auth‑aware redirection, profile onboarding logic, and root layout integration.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary that displays an error UI with reset and session‑clear options.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Main layout providing header, navigation, footer, authentication‑aware nav items, and branding.
Displays a segmented audio input level meter using audio level data from a custom hook.
frontend/src/components/AuthenticatedFlo: Displays an error screen for authenticated users when an operation fails, offering retry and session-clearing actions.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Controls authentication flow, showing login prompts, handling login errors, and gating children until identity and actor initialization succeed.
frontend/src/components/ColorAccentPanel: Provides a neutral-styled bordered container for accenting content without bright colors.
Renders a styled page header with optional icon, title, and subtitle for different page variants.
frontend/src/components/DigitalVoiceConn: Manages creation and editing of Digital Voice connection settings, loading saved values and supporting presets like BrandMeister DMR.
frontend/src/components/DigitalVoiceSave: Shows the user’s saved Digital Voice configuration, highlighting missing fields and gateway readiness with masked sensitive data.
frontend/src/components/DirectoryBrowser: Displays a searchable, filterable directory of networks and talkgroups, supporting favorites and selection handling.
frontend/src/components/IaxDvswitchConne: Handles configuration for IAX/DVSwitch connections, including validation, presets like AllStar, and persistence to storage.
frontend/src/components/IaxDvswitchSaved: Displays saved IAX/DVSwitch connection settings or a notice if none exist, including masked credentials and server info.
frontend/src/components/InstallAppAction: Shows an install button for the PWA and provides iOS-specific installation instructions in a dialog.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Handles Internet Identity login/logout with retry and error handling, clearing cache and showing error alerts when needed.
frontend/src/components/NowHearingList.t: Renders a list of recent transmissions with metadata or shows loading/empty states.
frontend/src/components/PersonalDirector: Manages local personal directory entries with add, delete, and persistence in localStorage.
frontend/src/components/PostLoginInterst: Shows a fullscreen loading screen while finalizing user sign‑in.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Modal dialog for initial user profile setup with callsign, name, license acknowledgement, and validation.
frontend/src/components/PttControl.tsx: Push‑to‑talk button component handling press states and transmit callbacks with visual feedback.
frontend/src/components/RealTimeStatusBa: Renders a badge showing connection or transmission status based on props, choosing icons and styles dynamically.
frontend/src/components/TransmitDisclaim: Displays a warning alert requiring users to acknowledge their amateur radio license with a link to settings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithError.ts: Similar to useActor but adds detailed error handling, retries, and guarded query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioLevelMeter.ts: Captures microphone audio levels in real time using Web Audio API and reports normalized volume and activity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Provides hooks to fetch and save the caller's user profile using the backend actor with retries and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useFavorites.ts: Manages fetching and toggling a user's favorite networks through backend actor calls with cached updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context providing login, logout, and identity persistence using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useMicPttRecorder.ts: Handles push‑to‑talk audio recording via MediaRecorder, producing a blob URL and tracking recording state and errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useNetworks.ts: Fetches builtin networks and performs client‑side filtering for search queries using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useNowHearing.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch and update real-time "now hearing" transmission data via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/usePreferredConnectio: Defines connection types and helpers for storing, identifying, and validating user-selected network connection settings.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstall.ts: Manages PWA installability state, detects iOS support limits, and exposes a function to trigger installation prompts.
frontend/src/hooks/useQrzLookup.ts: Implements a mutation to perform QRZ callsign lookups through the backend actor if supported.
frontend/src/hooks/useRememberLoginPrefe: Stores and retrieves a user preference for remembering login status using localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserRole.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch the caller's user role and admin status from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useWebRtcPtt.ts: Implements WebRTC push-to-talk logic including room joining, audio handling, signaling, and gateway support.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind-based dark theme variables, global styles, and utility classes for the UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and the Internet Identity provider, then renders App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutCompliancePage.t: Renders an informational page describing PTTStar, its creator, features, and licensing requirements.
frontend/src/pages/ActivityPage.tsx: Displays a real‑time activity feed using NowHearingList with manual refresh and header panels.
frontend/src/pages/ConnectPage.tsx: Provides connection setup UI for IAX/DVSwitch and Digital Voice, handling presets, saved configs, and quick-setup flows.
frontend/src/pages/DirectoryPage.tsx: Lets users browse networks and talkgroups, manage personal entries, and save a directory-based connection before navigating to PTT.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing and onboarding page explaining requirements and guiding users toward setup and app navigation.
frontend/src/pages/PttPage.tsx: Controls WebRTC push‑to‑talk sessions, manages connection validation, auto-connect logic, and shows real‑time activity and status.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Allows users to edit and save profile data, license acknowledgement, and login preferences, with blockchain‑synced profile loading.
frontend/src/utils/digitalVoiceGatewayCl: Implements a WebRTC signaling client over WebSocket for Digital Voice gateways, handling join metadata and SDP/ICE messaging.
frontend/src/utils/roomKey.ts: Generates normalized room keys and human-readable labels based on various connection types and metadata.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning hash params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom colors, typography, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Describes the project state, existing features, and pending requests for refining post-login transitions.
